title: FilterV2 represents a user-defined filter for determining which statuses should not be shown to the user.
description: v2 filters have names and can include multiple phrases and status IDs to filter.

context.description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.

expires_at.description: When the filter should no longer be applied. Null if the filter does not expire.

id.description: The ID of the filter in the database.

keywords.description: The keywords grouped under this filter.

statuses.description: The statuses grouped under this filter.
